title: Why We Love (and Miss) Non-Sexual Stranger Hands Rubbing Us Down
itunes:title: Why We Love (and Miss) Non-Sexual Stranger Hands Rubbing Us Down
description:
This week comes with a few essentials for home massage and relaxing those muscles while still in quar quar. These are SuChin and Kulap’s go-to buys to make the body feel just a little bit better. Plus, the budget buys that are used All. The. Time. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

For a list and links to all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. 

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia.
